channel.title: 2 Questions... Please Help
channel.description:
QUESTION 1 I Need The Fix For Ice Barrage And Ice Burst!! So It Freezes!!
QUESTION 2 I Need The Fix For Ice Barrage So It Works On NPCS....
So If You Can.. Help Me Tyvm..

item.title: 2 Questions... Please Help
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

QUESTION 1
I Need The Fix For Ice Barrage And Ice Burst!! So It Freezes!!
Just go into client.java and search for the spell case, fix the entangle delay, the higher the delay, the longer the spell holds. You can find the spell case by right-clicking the spell in-game.

Read full topic
